name: Before the drift
description:
During the end of a world, collect mana from collapsing sky-islands. Who will get the higher score when the las islands will fall?
Before the drift is a tabletop-like game where you play with a friend (or whoever you want, but it's local only, so...).

Unfortunatly, we haven't finished at time, So we uploaded the Source Code but the build comes later.

credits : Gianni Roubot and Jason Huvet.
